data.message: I used to love your music... Notice the word used to... I will stand up for the flag and for the president of the United States. It's a shame that people including yourself spread so much hate and we wounder why America has seen so much change that we look more like a 3rd world country with shootings and bombs. Other countries used to look up to the United States but now they look down.

replies.message:
First off I have always believed all lives matter I never needed a slogan to believe it and before you judge me maybe I should inform you.
1) have have biracial kids 
2) biracial cousin's
3) 2  nieces who are gay
4) 2 cousin's who are gay and married and have  beautifully done so and have adopted children
5) I did not burn my bra 
And no matter who my president is or was I have respect for my country and don't agree with the promotion of hate. And I don't believe that people with the ability to reach millions of people should promote hate instead promote love, and respect for others. The hate promoting is why America is falling apart
